text: 11:26 Aposel 9:23; 13:50; 14:15; 20:3; 23:10-11Dughiar avɨribar kɨ saghuiabar ghua, dɨpabar ovengasava amua okɨmakɨar gumazibar dafaribar atam ovei. Egha uan adarazi Judabar dafaribar atam ovia, uaghan Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibar dafaribar atam ovei. Egha nguibar ekiabar aven atam ovei. Egha ruaribagh arua atam ovei. Egha ongarim gisɨn arua atam ovei. Egha ifavarir Kraisɨn adarazir dafaribar atam ovei.
